```{r}

ParasiteCod <- read.csv('ParasiteCod.txt', sep = '\t')

ParasiteCod$fArea <- factor(ParasiteCod$Area)
ParasiteCod$fYear <- factor(ParasiteCod$Year)

P12 <- glm(Prevalence ~  Length+fArea * fYear ,
           family = binomial, data = ParasiteCod)
summary(P12)


```



```{r}

drop1(P12, test = "Chi")



```


```{r}
anova(P12, test = "Chi")

```
